questions.question: My computer won't turn on. What should I do?
questions.answer: First, make sure the power cable is plugged in. Then, try pressing the power button again.

questions.question: How can I speed up my computer?
questions.answer: You can try clearing temporary files, uninstalling unnecessary programs, or upgrading hardware components like RAM or SSD.

questions.question: My computer is infected with malware. What should I do?
questions.answer: You should run a reputable antivirus program to scan and remove the malware. Make sure to keep your antivirus software updated.

questions.question: I forgot my computer password. How can I reset it?
questions.answer: You can reset your computer password using password reset options provided by your operating system. Alternatively, you can use password recovery tools or contact support for assistance.
